volop.name: Teach Online STEM Classes to K-8th Graders
volop.description:
Across the country, millions of students lack the resources to learn about STEM and computer science. Our non-profit organization, Robotics for All, strives to provide this vital area of education to underprivileged students through engaging online classes.

Robotics for All is seeking volunteers to teach virtual computer science classes. As a volunteer teacher, you will earn service hours while developing critical communication, teaching, and leadership skills, all of which will assist you in varying areas of interest. These class sessions will run for eight weeks, and have a time commitment of three hours per week.

If you are interested in joining our team, please read the full position description and apply with the following link: https://www.roboticsforall.net/overview-of-positions.html A subset of applicants will be invited to interviews prior to acceptance.

We look forward to engineering the future with you!

address.full: P.O. Box 56, PALO ALTO, California, US

volop.commitmentDetails: Volunteers are expected to commit for the duration of an eight-week long session, with approximately three hours of work per week (two one hour-long synchronous classes, reviewing homework and answering student questions in between).
volop.otherRequirements: All volunteers over the age of 18 will be background checked. While international volunteers will be considered, please keep in mind that a majority of our students will likely come from the United States so there may difficulties with time zones.

requestedAttachments.label: Is there anything you want to ask or tell us?
